ren_qty_surveyor = | ren_awards = | url = | references = }} [[File:Rigging of KDLT Tower.jpg|thumb|KDLT tower rigging]] The '''KDLT tower''' is a {{Convert|609.2|m|ft}}<ref name="FCC">{{ASR|key=104410|number=1042104}}</ref> high guy-wired aerial mast for the transmission of FM and TV programmes in [[Rowena, South Dakota]], [[United States|USA]].<ref name="FCC">{{ASR|key=104410|number=1042104}}</ref> The KDLT tower was completed in 1998 and is owned by Red River Broadcast Co., LLC.<ref name="FCC">{{ASR|key=104410|number=1042104}}</ref> Replacement of the antenna at the top of this tower was featured in an episode of ''[[World's Toughest Fixes]]''.<ref>http://video.nationalgeographic.com/video/player/national-geographic-channel/full-episodes/worlds-toughest-fixes/ngc-2000-foot-tower.html</ref> ==See also== * [[List of masts]], [[Table of masts]] * [[Tallest structures in the U.S.]] * [[List of the world's tallest structures]] == References == <references/> ==External links== * {{Structurae|id=s0013983|title=KDLT Television Tower}} * {{ASR|key=104410|number=1042104}} [[Category:Towers in South Dakota]] [[Category:Buildings and structures in Minnehaha County, South Dakota]] {{US-mast-stub}}
